casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michelle Smith WHITE 302A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2018 Andrew J. DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for White, Michelle Smith Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
